website_summaries.verdict: Booming, well-rounded sound in a portable, affordable package.
pros: This portable Bluetooth speaker offers 20 hours of playtime on a full charge and 2 hours of playtime after just a 20-minute charge
Produces crisp, clear sound at 100 dB with an impressive frequency range of 52-20,000 Hz
It even links with other speakers via Marshall's companion app
cons: Some users note slightly muddy bass tones at high volumes

customer_reviews.title: This thing thumps!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was skeptical when I took this speaker out of the package. Upon removing it, I was impressed with the solid craftsmanship and it looked tough. The real test was the sound. Pairing it to my phone and iPad was easy and I was able to play music immediately. The sound was perfect! Plenty of bass and no distortion. The treble was good, too. And, if it wasn't, the bass and treble are easily adjusted. I love the simplicity of the speaker, too. Worth the price and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Brock

customer_reviews.title: A step back from last model
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the changes- no longer has AUX input. Wake button- in exchange for what- higher version Bluetooth?! Not necessary. I liked the Gold trim on the older model. The sound is the same- I might add that the older one sounds a bit better separation. Shame!
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Loud with clarity
customer_reviews.text: I initially had a Bose Revolve+ because of the size and expectation it would be loud. The sound was good, but, to me, didn't compare to the style and amazing sound of Marshall's Kilburn II. The sound carried in a large room as I taught my Zumba Class. If I forget to charge, 20 minutes gives me a great boost and ability to play for over an hour. That said, this speaker plays long and strong. I love the easy to carry leather handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done with the material. Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and quality. Love the guitar-like sounds whenever you pair or unpair a device. Tough and durable. Love it! Update: After 4 uses the speaker stop working and now Marshall is processing my warranty inquire. Too bad it only lasted a month Update: I calles marshalls technical service and in 7 days a new Marshall arrived all the way from Sweden. Really happy abt how they handle my issue. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: The volume
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite!!!!! Wireless speaker it does the job. I use it at work and this shit!!! Is loud I do like 13:30 hours at work per day and i dont have to Charge it for 2 days (( that's only if I keep it low volume i get like 21 hours)) now if I play it loud I'm only going to get 10.30 or 11 00 hours that's it. Overall I love this speaker I also own a Boses speakers as well and I want to say that both speaks sound great and good bass
customer_reviews.author: Buddie Isaiah Franco

customer_reviews.title: no app support for this device
customer_reviews.text: The Marshall Bluetooth app for Android can't see this device. Yes, you can connect by Bluetooth but you can't adjust the equalizer or device hardware volume without walking over to the Kilburn and touching the knobs. Also ought to have a built-in place to stash the cord, in the device, or have some retention mechanism. The build and sound quality is great but the feature set is limited for such a new device. Multi-host Bluetooth doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Repp

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing! It looks great and sounds great! The build quality is awesome. Overall, very satisfied with the battery life and how loud this thing gets for its size. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Really good bluetooth amp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in order to listen to music via bluetooth from my phone. I also like to play along to music on guitar and needed something that was loud enough for that purpose. This amp sounds great loud, has great battery life, and looks great sitting on top of my guitar amp. The connectivity is flawless and smooth. Great little speaker, really loud and retains good sound quality at loud volumes!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Morris

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the doctors and nurses happy in OR
customer_reviews.text: I use my Kilburn II while working in the OR as a circulating nurse. The surgeons and residents like that it is easy to pair with. I like that the controls are easy to get to when you need quiet. But the biggest thing I like about the Kilburn II is how your phone doesn’t ring through. I looked at the Bose Soundlink Revolve Plus and decided against it because of it linking with phone calls. Also one of the Surgical Techs has the Bose and we both agree the Marshall sounds better. If it is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jon E

customer_reviews.title: this product has excellent sound and a good Bluetooth function.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product from Amazon on Black Friday. It took me almost 3 weeks to get the product because I was in Korea. The design of this product matchs well with cafes, shops, restaurants and homes. So I am very happy to buy the ideal product. Also, this product has excellent sound and a good Bluetooth function. Anyway, I received the product and used it until now, there was not a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: ByungGu Jeon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Great Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for his birthday because he is very finicky about the sound of his music. He is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit muddy sounding
customer_reviews.text: Some of the comments hear say this is audiophile grade sounds, but I thought this speaker is a bit muddy in the mid-bass range. I'm probably unfairly comparing this to my $2500 B&W speakers, but that's what I consider audiophile. To take the mud out, I turned the Bass down to 4, and crank the Treble.... much better. It would be nice to have a mid-control, but for a small, relatively affordable speaker, it sounds good. The speaker is fairly light, and the handle is useful. It linked up to my bluetooth device easily. The built-in amp does not have a lot of volume for use in larger spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Sybilrud

customer_reviews.title: Good looker and sound.
customer_reviews.text: This item is everything the name of " Marshall" stands for it hardly needs a manual to operate it or add your Bluetooth device. The sound quality is smooth and deep with adequate attention to the high notes. Myself I would like to have kept the power switch in the firm of a separate toggle switch as opposed to combining with the volume control. For carrying the guitar style strap is fine but could do with some padding to fit your fingers better the guitar style strap is meant to be on your shoulder not to carry with hands. All in all 9.5 out of 10 for the product it looks good and by golly it sounds fine.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Stedman

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I chosen a marshal speaker because I have had great experiences with marshal amps. This speaker will not stay blue tooth connected to my computer. It just stops being connected half way through a movie. I have tried everything since I got it to get it to stay connected. Its bad to say but I have went back to my $10 Walgreen's speaker because it is so frustrating. This really ruins the product for me. I will not and can not recommend this product especially given the price!
customer_reviews.author: Laurence G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and looks
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my Bluetooth speaker to this Marshall and I couldn't be happier. The sound is rich and deep and I have been using this almost every day for the last several weeks. I even used it for an outdoor movie and the sound was excellent for that too.I didn't care about the Alexa capability, so that was a non-issue. Battery life is so good that I can literally play this all day. Great speaker!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Annoying power on / off behavior
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty good and it's a decent looking speaker. When it powers on and connects to a device, it makes an annoying indicator noise. Also, if it doesn't receive an input signal for a few minutes, it powers itself off. This happens even if it's plugged into AC power. This feature is just rude.
customer_reviews.author: Giga

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality but after 6 months it will go in and out of being connected to the phone. The most annoying interruption to enjoying music.. I would buy from the actual site of Marshall because now amazon wont let me exchange it and I have no idea who to go through. I also read all the bad reviews and bought it anyway taking my chances. Seriously don't but it. This was expensive and my $10 cube Bluetooth speaker I got at wal-mart has lasted longer and been more reliable than a $200 speaker. such a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Larson

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced cheat bt speaker.
customer_reviews.text: The battery isn't that great. The sound just average compared to any 20$-30$ bluetooth speaker out there. My other bt speaker last longer on battery, sound much better, and super portable. And it just under 40$. This speaker is really just for those Instagram brainwashed zombie.
customer_reviews.author: DeadTreeDeliveryMan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speaker. Dont hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. Used it for a large BBQ and for music in my backyard for pool parties. Although its not as good as wired speakers around a pool area, for the money this cant be beat. The look is totally retro and classy. Have received multiple inquiries from friends about where to purchase this. The sound is fantastic and ability to adjust treble/bass is a great addition. Would not hesitate to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Marshall! Pro quality BT speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This little Marshall is built like an Audi. Looks like a piece of art. Amazing sound and performance in general. My only gripe is that you can’t couple 2 of them together (bought 2 to couple them) in stereo via the Marshall app, like you can with 4 of their other BT models. I can live with that, but I had to return one. Just didn’t need 2 separates. Highly recommend this stand-alone portable, water resistant, amazing little performer!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Issues when pairing with more then one phone
customer_reviews.text: The reason I am giving a one star is that the product malfunctions when connecting two devices in parallel. If we get a message say WhatsApp on any one device, the sound stops playing even thought the music is not played from that device. Which is kind of annoying coz you don't realise that your speaker is connected with some other device as well. I raised it with amazon but they suggested me to ship it back to US from Singapore which was again kind of pain. Contacting Marshall directly didn't helped. Now I have to live with a faulty speaker and they should have tested the dual pairing feature properly before releasing it.
customer_reviews.author: suvin

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker, I’m using it in my car since the head unit decided to quit on me. It has good loud sound, battery life is awesome, I’m not in the car a whole lot so it gets charged once a week or every 5 days. It looks like Marshall’s real full size speakers which is kind of retro look that I like too.
customer_reviews.author: Matt StL

customer_reviews.title: I love that it looks like a mini amp!
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a speaker I could bring out on the deck, beach, or to bring camping. The Marshal is awesome for all! Like a dummy I did leave it out in the rain after a night of .....sodas on the deck. No problem what so ever. It’s a little heavy when hauling it into the woods. The sound quality is great. It gives you excellent bass and hits the highs just right. The volume at max wont distort as advertised. But wont go loud enough to keep the Neihbor’s up.. all around great speaker for the money.
customer_reviews.author: michael n.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase a bose mini speaker but after reading portable Bluetooth speaker reviews decided to spend the extra money on the Kilburn. I'm so glad I did. The sound is so good, better than the bose. It's easy to use and paired with my Samsung S-10, the music is a joy to listen to. I haven't had it long enough to comment on battery life, but so far so good. I am extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Love my Kilburn
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about my Marshall Kilburn. My son gave me a Kilburn two years ago, and without boring people with technical details, my five stars review is: I love it. A few weeks ago my Bose speakers died, after many years of great service, and I needed another small, but powerful speaker for my garage, so I just bought the newer Kilburn II, and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Best rechargeable portable speaker on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This gets marked down in some corners due to the price -- but not here. This thing is worth every penny. It is beautiful, it is well made of durable, quality materials, and ‐ wow, the sound. WOW. Crystal clear even at very high volume, the best bass of any portable speaker I've ever owned, and backyard pool party loud. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steverino

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe the rich tones from a portable speaker. It's not comparable to a full blown audio setup but that's not the design or purpose. If you want good audio in a portable package, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. McEuen

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Superior, well balanced sound especially suited for rock and jazz. Quality retro appearance with solid old school knob controls. Or as we used to call them, pots. This unit also features super easy bluetooth setup and hookup. A better bang for your buck than Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Dadhertz

customer_reviews.title: It is what it needs to be
customer_reviews.text: To start with its not perfect, but if youre someone who loves the marshall brand and its legacy this is an absolute must buy. Unlike many people ther reviews this can get plenty loud for the occasion if cranked upto full volume. It does have a heavy bass which is just right. However, when all three knobs are cranked to full then the spreaker does start to sound muddy and. wouldnt recommend going that up. The materials are obviously premium as is the price. All in all its a good buy if you catch it on sale and it is on sale very often. P.S You can enjoy all genres on this speaker and not just rock.
customer_reviews.author: Sahil Lalaji

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I am a life long amateur musician. This amp produces a small thready sound......my 60's era boom box does a much better job hooked to a bluetooth interface. Don't waste your money.....This isn't the Marshall quality you may know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Since I got it I use it everyday! Sounds good and the battery was good too! I charge once then I can use it couple days. I don't know if it's waterproof. After all, no one pours water on a speaker for no reason just to see if it's waterproof. but I absolutely love it!!!!If grey color is same price as black one it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: These speakers really exceeded my expectations.. for the size of this speaker- it really sounds good.. cranked it up one day and I received a text from my neighbor next door saying that they can hear loud music from my house.. these speakers are amazing! Have 4 stars for battery life as I have yet to use the speakers for 20 hours.. I’m almost positive that the batter power will last that long.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Battery most impressive
customer_reviews.text: I was most impressed by the battery life. Day and half of solid play time at 60-80% volume. I wouldn't have minded a bit more bass, but I've overlooked it due to the sound quality and crispiness. Portable enough for weekend trips and around the house/backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection is annoying
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase I love my speaker but it is very annoying that it connects to other devices so frequently. I have to constantly track what devices have been connected with my kilburn before using it. I constantly have manually turn off all Bluetooth devices (laptops, tv, handhelds and tablets) otherwise the speaker will consistentlym cut off my connection to connect to something else. It’s very annoying if I’m preoccupied with something and I have to stop what I’m doing just to track what device is connected instead of being able to disconnect from the speaker and stick to one specific connection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is extraordinary, simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for its size. Really like the simplicity of this speaker. I haven't had it die on me like others, knock on wood. Worth the price to get this kind of portability and sound. Use it at home too since it is easy to use and connects to my phone fast vs my home entertainment system that I spent a lot more money on.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! The best portable "Boombox" type radio I have ever had! The ease of use and sound quality is awesome. If you are looking for something that sounds incredible and is easily portable, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Shoelson

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH BASS, way worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was pricier than I wanted but the base kicks so much harder than any speaker I’ve tried out before. 100% worth every penny Battery life is awesome, 20+ hours Bass is unreal, I love it. The look is cool and love the handle to carry
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound From Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is a huge upgrade from my previous bluetooth speaker. Some people say that the Marshall speaker sound profile is crunchy, but I don't hear it. Sound is clean and balanced, and fills a room easily. I like the analog control knobs (volume, treble, bass). Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kayaky7

customer_reviews.title: What’s that weird Bluetooth jingle all about?
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. But totally unpredictable Bluetooth interruptions My wife and I listen al lot to this speaker and appreciate the good sound. But the Bluetooth “jingles” are sooooooooooooooooooo annoying. We were half a millimeter from throwing this this into our fireplace. It’s a true love hate relationship with this “quirky” little good sounding piece of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: U. Flathmann

customer_reviews.title: THIS DIDN'T LAST LONG
customer_reviews.text: I purchased & received this on Aug 18, 2020, via Amazon as the seller & shipper. As of today, Aug 29, 2020, it is officially DEAD. It worked fine (and sounded great) when I first received it but something has happened to it tonight and it will no longer power on. I guess I'll have to send it back for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P.

customer_reviews.title: Its a Marshall....
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, but money well-spent. Deep, full-bodied sound, pleasing highs & mids... Held this in my cart until I could afford it, but happy with my reasearch and the purchase. Rugged, portable, enough volume for anyone, a good buy, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bro
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review in my life and to be honest I really don’t think I’m ever going to write another review because it takes a lot of effort but holy cow. This speaker is IT. I love it. It’s gorgeous, so powerful, it’s battery is awesome, and it’s just overall so awesome. I’m in love. I was hesitant about dropping this much money on a speaker especially cause I already had one but the moment I turned this bad boy on and listened to it— I realized it was so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Enea Kongoli

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive, but the quality is second to none. I can’t put this on full volume because it’s so loud. The quality, and bass sounds awesome! The battery lasts forever, and the look is awesome with the leather. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the $$.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had for a few days but this thing is awesome. Great sound quality. No distortion at max volume. Have played it around 4 hours and the battery has not budged off of full. I recommend it so far. If any change I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Old school - if you had this in the late 70’s people would think you were an alien!
customer_reviews.text: Listening to Led Zeppelin the way it should be heard. I love it! Great bass - great treble! Listening next to a camp fire and it’s just awesome! Old school layout!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Schlueter

customer_reviews.title: impressive for its size!
customer_reviews.text: my favorite thing i can say about this is that my family said it was too loud! so much in such a small package ! very very satisfied. 5 stars. was hesitant thought about waiting for the kilburn 3 but after purchasing a kilburn 1 for a family member and being so impressed i had to buy a kilburn for myself so glad i got the 2 :)
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I simply love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best purchase I have made lately. There is no way and speaker sounds as good as this. Has the ambient sound of a very large system.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Cavender

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker from Marshall
customer_reviews.text: I’ll keep this one short, this speaker is awesome. So far the battery life is awesome, the build quality and a modern look are both their and most importantly it sounds phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Schaal, Jr. (k.schaal@pbnec.com)

customer_reviews.title: Small but packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: What a great speaker. Honestly, this speaker was not made for your rap/hip pop, instead it was designed to accentuate the sounds of guitars, drums, acoustics, and other instrumentation. This thing slaps pretty hard indoors but not too loud outdoors. However this thing is pretty small and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The analogy ill make is that its like buying name brand instead of generic. It does have great sound for the volume it takes up, as well as an ideal look and style. As a prop for taking photos its great, but its not worth the price if you look at the product for its sheer functionality. You can get better sound for the same price, or comparable for less, but style wise its hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Morandini

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speaker
customer_reviews.text: My son had one of these and brought it here over the Christmas holidays. I loved the sound so much and missed it when he left, so I bought one for our house. My favorite thing in the house, now. It’s fantastic, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding solid speaker
customer_reviews.text: Really nice speaker, looks and sounds of high quality. Got for a good sale price, wouldn't have paid $299 though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well built speaker. Sounds good too. I have gone through a lot of blue tooth speakers. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker out there for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great, good Bass and good highs. Fills a room with sound. Bought one for me, my sons, and a good friend. 4 Can’t give a better review than that.
customer_reviews.author: steve decatur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Marshall makes the best stuff hands down. Built like a tank and rocks. You won’t find a better portable blu tooth speaker

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Really great sound. Buttons feel like very high quality as well as the carrying strap. The only deficit in my experience: It does not work so well to have to devices conected via bluetooth at the same time. In my case most of the time my tablet and my phone are around at the same time and conected and one device gets disconected while I am playing music on that one device.
customer_reviews.author: Leonie

customer_reviews.title: Always good music with me
customer_reviews.text: I like the speaker I have it with me all the time when I travel nice clear sound with the money
customer_reviews.author: Peter koenig

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth portable speaker on market hands down!!
customer_reviews.text: Best portable bluetooth speaker on the market! Nothing sound better! Amazing durable build quality and long battery!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I love listening to downloaded music via my Marshall Kilburn II. One of my best purchases ever on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: William O.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Best sound quality and battery you can get for this price point! Everyone compliments it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Personalized Sound and
customer_reviews.text: A Quality Piece of Equipment For Personal Small Room or Mobile Enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: taskmasterendgame

customer_reviews.title: Short lifetime
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 2019 august and it died by 2020 March. I am trying to look for warranty papers...
customer_reviews.author: Peter Koncz

customer_reviews.title: 🔥
customer_reviews.text: Man, I don’t usually write reviews but I saw some hate on this speaker before I bought which made me skeptical....wow those people were deaf cuz this speaker is awesome!!! 🙌🏼 I own several Bose speakers and this Marshall is just as great if not better! Thing bumps, you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: tyler copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect performance with an attractive look.
customer_reviews.text: This has a very well rounded sound. Nice to have some bass and treble adjustments, for personal preference. The battery life is great, lasts me all day. I was attracted to the speaker by it's look and design, the retro amp look. Very cool. Impressed by it's overall performance. Cannot speak to the water resistance, have no desire to place this speaker near water or moisture. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bluetooth Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker. I’ve tried the Megaboom3 and some other cheaper brands. And I’m happy with the Killburn2 by far.
customer_reviews.author: geign206

customer_reviews.title: It's Marshall sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound. No need to test water resistance, it sets in the house. It's doesn't take up any room. I can run it all day easy to recharge. I own other Marshall speakers so I know the good sound!!?
customer_reviews.author: Too F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product , I love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker ! Amazing bass for such a little unit ! I was very impressed ! I used it for our small outdoor memorial for my mom and it served us great ! Of course I love the look as well , very very cool !
customer_reviews.author: Galadriel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for himself because he loves to listen to music. This is worth paying the price because it produces the loudness he enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth speaker I've ever purchased by far! Great sound plus adjustable bass and treble. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: 40 Year Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, looks amazing, just a little heavy for a portable speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Will Chen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant at first because main use would be outside by pool. Wasn’t sure if would be loud enough, but it far exceeded my expectations. Sound is crisp and clear with deep bass. Replaced anker Bluetooth speaker I’m in heaven now hopefully neighbors don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cook

customer_reviews.title: Sounds better than any portable speaker that i have heard so far.
customer_reviews.text: Serious bass. Cool Marshall retro looks. Very long battery life. Sounds better than any portable speaker that i have heard so far. Not cheap but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: I like cold beverages

customer_reviews.title: Lot of Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It goes wherever I do. MAX sound for a small package.
customer_reviews.author: Dopp leganger

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, nice to have treble and bass controls. Used it for a few months and never lost Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN CHAPMAN

customer_reviews.title: quit working
customer_reviews.text: Within 3 months after purchase, it abruptly quit working. Why? It was fully charged. Contacted Amazon help and was told I will soon get a link for a replacement unit since it's under warranty. Loved the unit but like it even better when it's works! Hopefully just an isolated defective unit.....tbd.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Z Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Like a rock star!
customer_reviews.text: Love the design of this portable speaker, it looks like a miniature of the originals. The sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down and no customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2019, two weeks later had it replaced bc it kept turning off for no reason. Fast forward to 2020 (ugh) and the problem started again. Now, it will not charge or turn on. I emailed the company. No reply, no help. I gave it two stars bc it looks good. I was being generous. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Bass! Bitches
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap! The bass is the best in it's size for sure!
customer_reviews.author: patrick clark

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Marshall Kilburn II Portable Bluetooth Speaker! It’s even better than we expected. The sound is wonderful, which is saying a lot, my husband is a musician. We’re using the speaker in our vintage Corvair. We’re enjoying our road trips even more.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Mennona

customer_reviews.title: great battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and battery life, sounds much better than my Bose soundlink II and longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great value when on sale.
customer_reviews.text: Great getting it on sale. Great sound and great price. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: fasttr

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound, but pricey
customer_reviews.text: The sound delivers big time as does its design, but for $200 i bet there are better alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Farns Bigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear at Distance
customer_reviews.text: Banging Base Hi's and Mids for a portable Typical top notch Marshall Product !!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mahorney

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is alright. Like the build and feel. Satisfied overall
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: It’s looks and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and sound of this speaker. The other competitors out there may sound a little better or are waterproof but this looks so good. The quality is what would be expected from Marshall. I’m glad I picked this speaker... It’s not a tube
customer_reviews.author: E. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speaker for sound quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: Son's favorite Christmas present, ever. He's a stickler for sound quality, and he gave it thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is a bit pricey but the durability and long battery life help make it worth the money. Has an issue when multiple devices have connected to it as it tends to grab the next device as it enters the room. This is a bit aggravating but love it other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L White

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and sound.
customer_reviews.text: My fourth product from Marshall. The battery life and sound are amazing. Much better than the first. I have the stanmore for the house. Amazing acoustics from it. I bring the kilburn to most outdoor events. People are super impressed. Quality products that are enjoyed daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth for money
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound from such a small device! Turn it up all the way, it never distorts. After using Bose for decades, I decided to give this little guy a try. WOW. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Eifert

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 6 month ago and I do enjoy it very much. Defiantly better sound than HomePods from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Ponomarev

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to carry and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about waterproofing, but the product is good to carry around and the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: kim,d-y

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is when the battery gets low it makes a tune letting you know but it happens every couple of minutes til it dies unlike the first model.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made in a long time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. My son and parents have one too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: This lasted 8 months... now won’t turn on at all....? Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Coda

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good speaker. I would easily recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Nitish kumar

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loves it! There are not a ton of features to the product, which makes it easy to use. A tad bit on the heavy side, so you may not want to take it around too far.
customer_reviews.author: Shinhye Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Bada$$ speaker
customer_reviews.text: Best f-ing Bluetooth speaker hands down! I pair it with my Bluetooth turntable and it picks all the Ambience of the true vinyl feel. Excellent battery, and the bass and treble features are beyond any other speaker on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Sound cut off if walking between speaker and source. Classic looks poor reception
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s sounds perfect and it is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Of all of the speakers I’ve herd and seen in my time this one has to be one of my favorites and the classic design is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Orozco

product_meta.title: Marshall Kilburn II Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Black (1002634)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Pattern Name:SpeakerGet on the road with Marshall Kilburn II portable speaker. Free from the confines of wires and cords, this Bluetooth speaker offers 20+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. This stout-hearted Hero weighs only 6 lbs. And is the loudest speaker in its class. It produces a clear midrange, deep base and extended highs that are unrivaled for a speaker This size, and its multi-directional sound will immerse you in your music, indoor or out. Echoing the legacy of rock "n" Roll, Kilburn II has a solid metal grille that Pats homage to the steel mesh grille found on many microphones and a guitar inspired carrying strap for easy portability. Its flush mounted corner caps and water-resistant design make it supremely rugged and durable. Kilburn II is able to withstand even the longest days on the road.
feature_bullets: Kilburn II offers 20+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge.
Comes equipped with Bluetooth 5. 0 apt technology for wireless music play. Play music with any Bluetooth device at a range of up to 30 feet away from the speaker
New durable design with new grill and corner caps
Kilburn II features multi-host functionality so you can easily connect and switch between two Bluetooth devices.
Quick charge option (20 minutes -> 2 hours playtime
Multi-directional sound via Bluefin stereo sound; Frequency Range: 52 - 20,000 Hz

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars672 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
